Title: Relates to monetary penalties that a parking violations bureau may impose for illegally idling the engine of a motor vehicle
Summary: Relates to monetary penalties that a parking violations bureau may impose for illegally idling the engine of a motor vehicle.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to monetary penalties that the parking violations bureau may impose for illegally idling the engine of a motor vehicle
